summary: This document is a trading authorization form from Deutsche Bank Wealth Management, allowing an agent to buy and sell securities on behalf of the undersigned. It outlines the responsibilities and liabilities of both the undersigned and Deutsche Bank in relation to trading activities.
keyFacts: The document authorizes an agent to trade securities on behalf of the undersigned.
It includes indemnity clauses protecting Deutsche Bank from losses related to the trades.
The authorization remains in effect until revoked by the undersigned in writing.
The document specifies that it is a continuing authorization and does not limit other agreements with Deutsche Bank.
There are references to Deutsche Bank Securities Inc. and its parent company, Deutsche Bank AG.
